nutrients.name: Protein
nutrients.description: Essential for building and repairing tissues, and is a key component of muscles, skin, and enzymes.

nutrients.name: Carbohydrates
nutrients.description: The body's main source of energy, important for brain function and physical activity.

nutrients.name: Fats
nutrients.description: Important for hormone production, nutrient absorption, and providing energy.

nutrients.name: Vitamins
nutrients.description: Organic compounds that are essential for various bodily functions.
food_sources: Fruits (citrus fruits for Vitamin C, bananas for Vitamin B6)
Vegetables (leafy greens for Vitamin K, carrots for Vitamin A)

nutrients.name: Minerals
nutrients.description: Inorganic elements that play a role in various bodily functions.

nutrients.name: Fiber
nutrients.description: A type of carbohydrate that aids in digestion and helps maintain a healthy gut.
food_sources: Whole grains (oats, brown rice, whole wheat bread)

nutrients.name: Water
nutrients.description: Essential for hydration, temperature regulation, and overall bodily functions.
